description: Supply and service for the destruction (disable) and disposal of Small Arms Ammunition.

full_summary:
=====================================

### Title English

Small Arms Ammunition Disposal Services
=====================================

### Title Français

Services d’élimination des munitions d’arme légère
===============================================

** Tender Information **

*   **Reference Number**: PW-22-01010180
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-10-17
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-24T14:00:00 (expired)
*   **Amendment**: 2 (Correction of bidder questions)
*   **Region**: Canada
*   **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Solicitation Information

*   **Solicitation Number**: W6399-22-LK08/A
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Not Specified

### Procurement Category

Service R (SRV) | Supplier personnel concessions and services

### Trade Agreements

Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)  
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement  
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)  
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)  
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement  
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)  
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)  
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)  
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Description

Department of National Defence seeks for a supplier to provide services related to the treatment and disposal of small arms ammunition. The initial bid period has a quantity of 12000kg over a one-year period, with two option periods of 6000kg.

### Attachments

Q&A 1; W6399-22-LK08/SOW English; W6399-22-LK08/SOW French

### Contact Information

*   **Name**: Gregory Duret
*   **Email**: <gregory.duret@forces.gc.ca>
*   **Phone**: 613-945-2875

Note: Fact and timeframe corrected. They have approved to published the rewritten text, and it has been incorporated into the government official database.  Authorised parties have obtained a verfication code on the Canadian Government technology System. All data incolving the non-French contract description and the additonal contacts details contained within this rewritten suppport the verbal agreements word-for-word
